title: Where can I find articles from 1939, 1940, 1941?
text:
As of now, your best bet is either the New Hanover County Public Library or UNCW's Randall Library. They should have old StarNews issues archived on microfilm.



We are working on digitizing the StarNews archives so you'll be able to search issues back to our first issue online, but it's still a work in progress. It will be announced in the StarNews when it goes live.
